name: rich.print
signature: rich.print(*objects: Any, sep: str = ' ', end: str = '\n', file: Optional[IO[str]] = None, flush: bool = False) -> None
summary: Print object(s) supplied via positional arguments.
desc:
This function has an identical signature to the built-in print.
For more advanced features, see the :class:`~rich.console.Console` class.

args.name: sep
args.desc: Separator between printed objects. Defaults to " ".

args.name: end
args.desc: Character to write at end of output. Defaults to "\\n".

args.name: file
args.desc: File to write to, or None for stdout. Defaults to None.

args.name: flush
args.desc: Has no effect as Rich always flushes output. Defaults to False.
